SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM account where account_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by to_number(account_num) desc ) a)
where rnum > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} and rnum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
select * from account where account_num = #{account_num}

select a.account_name, t.ticket_reservation_time, t.ticket_reservation_price, t.ticket_reservation_status, t.ticket_reservation_num from account a , ticket_reservation t where t.account_num = a.account_num
